thread.title: Ground News - Severe dry spells to hit the country next year, in 2026
thread.title_full: Ground News - Severe dry spells to hit the country next year, in 2026

author: The Star Kuala Lumpur
title: Ground News - Severe dry spells to hit the country next year, in 2026
text:
Summary by The Star Kuala Lumpur PETALING JAYA: Parts of Malaysia have been baking under a heatwave, but brace yourself, the worse is yet to come, with a government report projecting severe dry spells next year and in 2026. Read full story Share menu 0 Articles 0 Articles All Left Center Right
